name: Macaroni Imperial
author: Vernita Bles

ingredients.name: c. uncooked macaroni, broken in pieces

instructions: Cook macaroni in large amount of boiling salt water until done. Then drain. Combine bread crumbs, butter, red and green peppers, onion, salt and cheese. Add hot milk over egg yolks, stirring well. Add macaroni then fold in egg whites. Pour into well greased casserole. Bake in a moderate oven 325Â°, until firm.
